title: Biden and Obama Reunite in a Last-Ditch Effort to Save Their Party
description: A rally on Saturday in Philadelphia was their first joint campaign appearance since President Biden took office, adding a twist to the relationship of what has always been a political odd couple.
dc:creator: Peter Baker and Alan Rappeport
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden and former President Barack Obama teamed up in a last-ditch effort to save their partyâ€™s midterm election hopes at a rally in Philadelphia on Saturday.
